meanings.definition: A bulging of the front wall of the rectum into the vagina.
meanings.sent1: After giving birth, she developed a rectocele.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with a rectocele after her symptoms worsened.
meanings.sent3: The rectocele made her feel like she had a secret compartment in her body.
meanings.sent4: Her rectocele was like a hidden treasure chest waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The rectocele felt like a small bump, a reminder of her body's changes.

meanings.definition: A condition in which the rectum bulges into the back wall of the vagina.
meanings.sent1: She experienced discomfort due to her rectocele.
meanings.sent2: The rectocele caused her pain during bowel movements.
meanings.sent3: Her rectocele seemed to have a mind of its own, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The rectocele was a silent intruder, disrupting her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The rectocele felt like an unwelcome guest, overstaying its welcome.
